body.p: These examples portray hypothetical situations illustrating how an entity might apply some of the requirements in IFRIC 23 based on the limited facts presented. In all the examples, as required by paragraph 8 of IFRIC 23, the entity has assumed that the taxation authority will examine amounts it has a right to examine and have full knowledge of all related information when making those examinations.
